title: Socket-outlet Earthing Conductor
fullText:
The protective earthing conductor of a final subcircuit supplying a socket-outlet shall be connected to the earthing terminal or connection of the socket-outlet.

Exception: The protective earthing conductor need not be connected to the earthing terminal or connection if the socket-outlet is—
• (a) supplied at extra-low voltage; or
• (b) supplied by a separated extra-low voltage system.
